wikipedia_page.main: George Tait (1859 – 25 November 1882) was an English international footballer who played as a centre forward.

response: * George Tait – First Principal of the Presbyterian Ladies' College, MelbourneAustralian Dictionary of Biography (2007). .
George Tait played in a friendly international for England against Wales in February 1881. He was the only player to be capped for England while an Excelsior player.
